@ piiroinen - and others.nn1- in Google chrome browser -> goto EXTENSIONS ( click the drop down arrow near the SPANNER looking icon top right of chromes browser screen) click GET MORE EXTENSIONS .....n2- At the top of screen type into the search bar - Adblock Lite -...install that.n3- go back to Chromes browser EXTENSIONS again...you will now see the addblock lite there....click OPTIONn4- now just click UPDATE DEFAULT FILTER....and click CLOSEn5- restart ya browser and enjoy.nnif i got any steps wrong just give me a yellnnthis is for Google Chrome Browser ONLY... i dont use any other so i can help ya with IE etc.nnWorks for me....cheers.....RoBBiE
